name: Walks Near Me
overview: Built using Android Studio, this native Android application showcases local walks around London. Includes features such as Dark Mode and Geolocation.
challenges: Android development was always something that I wanted to learn back during University. So, when I decided to build Walks Near Me, I immediately set out to challange myself. The application needed to have a clean layout which users would be able to navigate with ease.
outcomes: As this project is still under development, outcomes will added when project is complete

name: Portfolio Website
overview: Portfolio Website built using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and ASP.NET Core 3.1.
challenges: The initial aim when building this portfolio website was for me to improve my JavaScript knowledge. Therefore I decided it had to be built using no front end frameworks. As an additional challenge I wanted to be compatible with all supported web browser versions which included including Internet Explorer 11.
outcomes: This project is still under development. Outcomes will be posted soon
